articles.title: Archie Battersbee: Parents to take case to European Court of Human Rights - BBC
articles.description: The 12-year-old's life support was due to be withdrawn on Wednesday morning.
articles.content:
Archie Battersbee's parents have submitted an application to the European Court of Human Rights (ECHR) in a bid to postpone the withdrawal of his life support.
Life-sustaining treatment for the 12-y… [+1636 chars]

articles.author: John Leicester
articles.title: Cold showers, no lights: Europe saves as Russian gas wanes - The Associated Press - en Español
articles.description: PARIS (AP) — Fanning out like urban guerrillas through Paris' darkened streets well after midnight, the anti-waste activists shinny up walls and drain pipes, reaching for switches to turn off the lights.
